timeline_2.speaker: Player
timeline_2.text: [b]Whoa! Who are you? And what’s happening to me?![/b]

timeline_2.speaker: Companion
timeline_2.text: I am your [b]Personal Learning Assistant[/b], a program designed to guide you.

timeline_2.speaker: Companion
timeline_2.text: You attempted to bypass learning with AI. Now, you must [b]truly understand[/b] computing to escape.

timeline_2.speaker: Companion
timeline_2.text: [b]Not forever.[/b] If you complete the required tasks, you will regain control.

timeline_2.speaker: Companion
timeline_2.text: You’ll be navigating through a structured computing simulation, designed to teach you fundamental concepts. Think of it as a crash course—except failing isn’t an option.

timeline_2.speaker: Player
timeline_2.text: [b]Wait… what do you mean by 'computing simulation'?[/b]

timeline_2.speaker: Companion
timeline_2.text: This world is built on the core principles of computer science. You’ll interact with binary data, construct logic gates, optimize algorithms, and even battle real-world-inspired viruses that corrupt the system.

timeline_2.speaker: Player
timeline_2.text: [b]So, I have to… code my way out?[/b]

timeline_2.speaker: Companion
timeline_2.text: More like learn how everything in a computer actually works—from the smallest bits and bytes to the most complex AI-driven systems.

timeline_2.speaker: Companion
timeline_2.text: Let’s just say you won’t like the results. But don’t worry! I’ll be here to guide you through every step. Now, let’s get started.

timeline_3.speaker: Companion
timeline_3.text: This system is [b]not secure[/b]. Malicious programs roam freely.

timeline_3.speaker: Player
timeline_3.text: [b]Wait… you mean viruses? Like the ones that infect computers?[/b]

timeline_3.speaker: Companion
timeline_3.text: [b]Correct.[/b] You will encounter various [b]hostile entities[/b], each modeled after real-world malware.

timeline_3.speaker: Companion
timeline_3.text: Some will corrupt data, others will replicate, and some may even try to erase you.

timeline_3.speaker: Companion
timeline_3.text: It is. But knowledge is power. The more you learn, the better you can [b]debug and survive.[/b]

timeline_3.speaker: Companion
timeline_3.text: Let’s start with the first type: [b]The Worm.[/b] Unlike other threats, it spreads rapidly across systems...
